page.title: 16NORTH BORDER JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Mr.Brewster is the school headmaster. He has an office on the third year corridor. He arrives at half past eight every morning, and finishes at quarter to four every evening. He takes assemblies on Wednesday and Friday,and sometimes brings visitors in. Mr.Brewster has two Deputy heads in this school, they are Mr.Birch and Mr.Wood. We are in Mr.Woods class,he also runs a choir which we are in. This year we have been quite successful,in competitions.In June this year we were asked to sing in the Norwich Sing For Pleasure Festival with nine other choirs, for the second time. We also attended the International Musical Eisteddfod in Llangollen,for the second time. We came fifth in the Preliminarys but unfortunately did not get through to the final in the marquee.
